komunitinIs: Komunitin is an open source platform that offers social currency management for group communities.
alreadyRegisteredToALocalGroup: Already registered to a local group?
findGroupNearby: Find an group network near you and start using social currency
orSelectCountry: or select a country to find it
findComunnity: Find your community and start participating.
enableNotificationsText: Enable notifications to be aware of movements in your account and important news in your network. You can configure or disable them later.
deniedNotificationsText: This device blocks our notifications. You may allow notifications from Komunitin in your browser settings.
incompatibleNotificationsText: This device doesn't support web push notifications. If you're on Safari you may update to version 16.4.
enableLocationText: Let Komunitin know your location so it can sort network resources based on proximity.
deniedLocationText: This device blocks access to your location so Komunitin can't sort resources by proximity. You may fix that in your browser settings.
transactionFormHelpText: Fill the following fields to create a transaction that will transfer some currency amount to your account.
transactionPayerHint: The account of person or entity that makes the payment.
transactionDescriptionHint: Brief description of the concept of the sale, for example '2kg of potatoes'.
invalidAmount: Invalid amount. Enter a positive number.
needFormHelpText: Fill the details of your new need.
uploadNeedImagesHint: Adding a picture to a need makes it more attractive
title: Title
needDescriptionHint: Provide here all the details for other members to understand your need
needCategoryHint: Select the category that best describes your need
needExpirationDateHint: The date when your need will expire
needDescriptionRequired: Explain your need with some detail
needPublishedHint: Make this need visible to other members
deleteNeed: Do you want to delete the need {name}?
offerFormHelpText: Fill the details of your new offer.
uploadOfferImagesHint: Adding some pictures to an offer makes it more attractive
offerCategoryHint: Select the category that best describes your offer
offerTitleHint: A short title for your offer
offerDescriptionHint: Provide here all the details for other members to understand your offer
offerDescriptionRequired: Explain your offer with some detail
offerPriceHint: Enter just a number eg '10', or '15 Â¤/hour', or anything like 'depends on piece' or 'contact-me'
offerExpirationDateHint: The date when your offer will expire
offerPublishedHint: Make this offer visible to other members
deleteOffer: Do you want to delete the offer {name}?
acceptPaymentsHint: When this option is enabled, payments to other accounts will be automatically accepted. Otherwise, you will have to accept them manually.
notificationsSettingsText: Configure the push notifications you receive in your devices.
myAccountNotificationsHint: Receive notifications about movements in your account: payments, pending transactions, expired offers and needs...
editProfileHelpText: Fill the details of your profile as you want other members to see you.
name: Name
nameHint: Your full name or organization name as you want other members to see you
bioHint: A brief description of yourself or your organization
emailHint: Your email to log in and receive important notifications. Use the buton below to change it.
changePasswordText: Enter your current password and the new one you want to use.
oldPasswordHint: Enter your current password to confirm the change
newPasswordHint: Your new password must be at least 8 characters long
changeEmailText: Enter your current password and the new email you want to use from now on.
emailChangeHint: Your new email must be valid and not already in use by another user
emailChanged: Your email has been changed to {email}.
resetPasswordText: Enter your email and we will send you a link to reset your password.
resetLinkSentText: We have sent you an email with a link to reset your password. Check your inbox and follow the instructions.
ErrorPositionPermisionDenied: Error: Permision denied while trying to get your position
ErrorNotificationsPermissionDenied: Error: Permission denied while trying to subscribe to push notifications
